Please note; if per chance your payment is with a debit card you need to be aware that our system will process this payment by first attempting to collect the $0.25 fee followed by the $70.00 to AAA Water District should the payment to AAA Water District fail for any reason the fee transaction will be voided however due to the way debit cards work over the internet it will take an estimated 4 business days for the funds to be returned to the bank account they were debited from. This issue also applies to pre-paid credit cards, as well with pre-paid credit cards you may incur transaction fees from the issuer of the card so it is important to make sure the cards has enough funds to cover all the fees to avoid any issues.
